duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and manage news personnel; assignment editors, writers, producers, editors, anchors, reporters, digital.
Lead in the editorial process and occasionally produce content/newscasts in the newsroom, in the field and for news specials.
Ensure staff is producing visually dynamic content across all platforms and collaborate effectively with the newsroom.
Develop and assemble content on multiple platforms, incorporating and showcasing content from multiple platforms into newscasts.
Continually evolve the newscasts by working closely with news management and challenging the staff to perform at their highest levels every night.
Supervise the work of others and work in a fast-paced environment under specific time constraints.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Journalism or Communications and minimum four years recent experience in a newsroom as a senior news producer or executive producer.
Exceptional news judgment, strong writing, and copy editing abilities.
Demonstrated ability to think out of the box and find new ways to present information.
Must be self-motivated, effectively work independently and on a team, and supervise the work of others.
Weekends, holidays, and varied hours required.
